page.title: 01General Introduction
page.content: This Domesday Block forms part of the Surrey commuter belt and lies two miles south of Guildford. It is a well populated area, residential rather than industrial, most people finding employment outside the area. There are excellent communications serving the area by road, rail and water. The D. Block forms a very pleasing environment with park and leisure facilities easily available. Educationally the area is served by several state schools and the private establishment of Charterhouse plays a prominent part in the community.
